summary: Airis is a daedric princess which were punished by the other daedric gods, they turned her into human form and now she roams Skyrim and causes chaos, she can be found at the Sleeping giant in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml: Airis is a daedric princess which were punished by the other daedric gods, they turned her into human form and now she roams Skyrim and causes chaos, she can be found at the Sleeping giant in Riverwood.
author: sandermann
